jobAttributes.description:
OLGA (Optimized Likelihood estimate of immunoGlobulin Amino-acid sequences) is a python software developed to compute the generation probability of amino acid and in-frame nucleotide CDR3 sequences from a generative model of V(D)J recombination. This iReceptor Analysis App splits the data into repertoires and then runs Olga on each repertoire, generating a PGEN score for each junction NT and AA sequence in the repertoire.

Notes:

  • Olga only computes generation probabilities for TRB, TRA, IGH, IGK, and IGL data, data from other loci will be ignored
  • The iReceptor implementaion of Olga only computes generation probabilities for Human samples, data from other species will be ignored
